snippet: In Montpelier, Vt., volunteers to help the elderly and earn hours of help for themselves.
abstract: In Montpelier, Vt., volunteers to help the elderly and earn hours of help for themselves.
lead_paragraph: Joan Black took a serious tumble two years ago, climbing up on a stepladder to reach for a punchbowl. She was about to host one of her frequent patio parties for a regional theater company in Montpelier, Vt.
